message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with. How about $125?
I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I can do $125, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.
I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $120, but that's as low as I can go.
